SentMessages.message: This first message should receive an acknowledgement
Before sending this second message, we diverted the LEDs. So it should not be acked and turn red.
Finally, this last message should be acked again.

ReceivedMessages.message: This message is sent from CD to AB. Received messages are displayed in white, since it is not known to the receiver whether the sender received the ack or not.
Sending to broadcast, will be received within the chat corresponding to this sender station (CD).

SentMessages.message: In the broadcast, messages are never acked and therefore always turn red.
As we can see clearly here.
However, as we will show now by receiving one message, they show up in the personal chat next.
